answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I have found a gun ban resolution in Iowa.
http://coolice.legis.state.ia.us/Cool-ICE/default.asp?Category=BillInfo&Service=Billbook&ga=84&hbill=SF128
I also found some news articles that might be helpful. Below is a list of places where they have passed or are considering passing a similar resolution. You might want to contact these areas for more information.
Whitefish Bay, WI:
http://www.todaystmj4.com/news/local/125607278.html
Waterloo, IA:
http://wcfcourier.com/news/local/article_9f2084f8-4c3c-532d-b735-cda9e22d6c26.html
Tuscaloosa, AL:
http://www.tuscaloosanews.com/article/20100217/NEWS/100219602/1007?p=2&tc=pg&tc=ar
Longmont, CO:
http://longmontledger.com/news/longmont-city-council-bans-carrying-of-firearms-in-city-buildings/
I hope these help!
Ali Iannolo
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org

author: Angel Smith
text:
Hello! 
I am looking for sample ordinances to ban firearms in City Buildings.
Thanks
title: Sample Ordinances to Ban Firearms
